website_summaries.verdict: An impressive set that includes everything a young avid golfer needs, all by a top name in the industry.
pros: Durable set by Callaway that includes a driver, sand wedge, putter, two irons, a fairway wood and hybrid
Comes in sets for different ages as well as left and right hand golfers
Ideal for kids that are serious about the sport
cons: Priciest option on our shortlist, but worth the price if you want a top-notch set

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the size 2 for my seven year old. We had a size one in the tour x clubs. Everything works great. He took them out last night was hitting farther which he should when going up a size, he really liked them. I probably would still do the tour x for a size one club since hey are a better price and the younger kids are pretty hard on clubs or lose them. The tour x bag was really nice. This bag is decent nice colors. Overall very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: savaii

customer_reviews.title: This is a teenager sized set
customer_reviews.text: Clubs set arrived nicely packed and in great condition. These Calloway clubs are really nice quality and look and feel great. They fit my 14 year old son perfectly (he is 63” tall). He moved up to this teen set from his junior Calloway set. These should bridge him for two years until he is ready for an adult size/ length set. Bag and clubs look great. Really happy with this purchase. Calloway does a great job with the junior and teen sets. Amazon does a great job with price and speed of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Junior golfers. You can tell the quality of the clubs, although for the price I thought the bag would be more durable. My son's gold instructors give him compliments every week. He is so proud, and my daughter is hitting longer drives. A must. As one reviewer wrote before, if you want your child to be the best...give them the best.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Great junior set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 7 year old son. He had the same set in version one for two years and was starting to have to lean over too much to make good contact. This version 2 (blue set) was the perfect answer! He's striking the ball much better because the club length fits him much better. Great product for the money! The only thing we wished it came with was a hybrid of some sort. The fairway metal is good, but it would have been nice to have another long iron option between the 7 iron and fairway wood. Thanks Calloway!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic set of Clubs, enought for current age.
customer_reviews.text: Well finished, great bag, light and strong, it's a great companion for two or tree years before upgrading for the Junior set. Putter has good grip and the head is well finished, the drive is also very effective for learning and also achieving long distances. Remember: it's a set for Kids, options as Cobra are OK, since has more Clubs, but Callaway Driver and Putter are good to go. The Bag finish and solid stand are very practical as a professional bag.
customer_reviews.author: Franco M. Lazzuri

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves them
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a quality set of clubs for the Grandson. He likes them Speedy delivery. Thank you for your time and consideration.
customer_reviews.author: louise a rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in great condition My daughter loves them. Great beginner clubs!
customer_reviews.author: Bookfiend

customer_reviews.title: Perfect young teenage clubs
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my 13 year old son - too big for kids clubs, not tall enough for adult clubs. These are a couple inches shorter than adult clubs. Quality is high with decent shafts and club heads that most kids clubs have.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great “teen” set! Fit my son perfectly. He is 5’ and a little small for men clubs but too big for kids clubs. Great quality and look more grown up than other kid sets.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 11 year old son theyare very good clubs buy them you won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clubs!
customer_reviews.text: Clubs look great! They were easily adaptable and she instantly started hitting better shots. Great set of clubs for your young golfer!
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: nice clubs
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these clubs and they are worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Laura O.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these clubs. He feels like a little professional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my son who was ready to move up in clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Bryant

customer_reviews.title: These fit my 6 yo perfect. He's a little on the shorter side
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 6 yo perfect. He's a little on the shorter side, which drives me nuts. I'm 6'3", hope he has a growth spurt.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Tieman

customer_reviews.title: Great set of jr. clubs
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these clubs. Perfect size for 10 to 12 years old. Could use a 5 iron in the set.
customer_reviews.author: myopin

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf XJ Junior Golf Set
feature_bullets: 7 Piece Set includes: Driver, Fairway Wood, Hybrid, 7-iron, 9-iron, Sand Wedge and Putter
The Right Set For Each Junior Player: The XJ line is specifically designed to provide the best junior equipment for young players.
Leading Performance Technologies: Designed with distance and forgiveness in mind, the XJ set line will help young players make clean contact and hit solid shots.
Ultra-light Clubs: These ultra-light weight sets are engineered so that each club is easy to swing for the best performance.
